name: PRATUS
longDescription:
**PRATUS** was designed for emergency management teams and organizations involved in disaster response. Built by practitioners for practitioners, PRATUS improves collaboration and decision-making during critical incidents and disasters. Fully integrated with Microsoft Teams, our solution supports your team throughout every phase of disaster management, training exercise planning and execution—all using familiar tools.

**Key Benefits:**

* **Streamlined Communication:** PRATUS creates a unified communication channel within Microsoft Teams, connecting inter-organizational response teams.

* **Timely Notifications:** Stay informed with alerts on shared files, member updates, and new incidents, ensuring your team is always up-to-date on emerging information.

* **Document Centralization:** Access and manage incident-related documents easily, with Teams serving as a secure document repository.

**Features:**

* Provision Teams from a PRATUS incident workspace using a template.

* Automatic installation of PRATUS within the newly provisioned Team.

* Adds incident members and guest users to the Team.

* Document integration for centralized file management.

* Synchronization of incident rosters with Teams sites.

* Streamlined ICS form generation and workflows.

* Geospatial intelligence for improved situational awareness.

* Power grid impact prediction for extreme weather hazards using our proprietary Energy Reliability Index (ERI).

* The Exercise Workspace provides a collaborative environment, centralizing training and exercise planning, execution, and analysis to maximize training value.

* Leverage an interactive Master Scenario Events List (MSEL) timeline in the Exercise Workspace to oversee or modify exercise execution.

**Supported Clients:** Microsoft Teams

**Intended Audience:** Crisis Managers, Emergency Managers, Master Exercise and Training Planners, Joint Force Exercise Planners

**Limitations and Conditions:** PRATUS has a dependency on the tenant administrator to configure and consent the app before any other tenant user can install and use the app. PRATUS requires a paid subscription for full access to its features. To get started, please contact our support team at [info@disastertech.com](mailto:info@disastertech.com).

PRATUS is seamlessly integrated with Microsoft Teams to deliver a dependable incident and exercise management solution. Through One Pane of Glass®, PRATUS improves communication and data access to optimize efficiency and reliability when you need it most.
shortDescription: One solution for incident management and training/exercise planning.

examplePrompts.prompt: @PRATUS Can you assist me in planning a training exercise for next month?
examplePrompts.description: The user asks the bot to help in organizing a training exercise.

examplePrompts.prompt: @PRATUS I need to create an incident report from last week's server outage.
examplePrompts.description: The user requests the bot to generate an incident report for a specific event.

examplePrompts.prompt: @PRATUS How can I improve our current incident management process?
examplePrompts.description: The user seeks advice from the bot on enhancing their incident management procedures.
